document.full_text: egypt will open its only crossing with the gaza strip this weekend, easing a four-year blockade on the hamas-ruled territory but setting up a potential conflict with israel.
document.title: egypt to open rafah crossing permanently
lines_and_colors: egypt will open its only crossing with the gaza strip this weekend, easing a four-year blockade on the hamas-ruled territory but setting up a potential conflict with israel.
